content: Any idea on this error? I do not know where that file is even coming from...
Need to use -version 4.0 to limit use of the Release 5 preview 2. I guess the latest is the default. (validator)
you should not get that error. if you do, I have a versioning error somewhere. But, yes, you need to use -version 4.0 if you are validating against R4
